shortDescription_pt: Website portfolio responsivo e moderno com Next.js
shortDescription_en: Modern and responsive portfolio website with Next.js
description_pt: Portfolio pessoal desenvolvido com Next.js 14, featuring sistema de blog integrado, internacionalização completa (PT/EN/ES), design responsivo com Tailwind CSS, e sistema de gerenciamento de conteúdo. Inclui páginas de projetos, blog com filtros por tags, e seção de contato funcional.
description_en: Personal portfolio developed with Next.js 14, featuring integrated blog system, complete internationalization (PT/EN/ES), responsive design with Tailwind CSS, and content management system. Includes project pages, blog with tag filters, and functional contact section.
